trends: There has been one other sighting in Caddo Gap
There were no other sightings in Caddo Gap on or around October 8th 2001
Summary: I thought I saw a shooting star, until it made a 9
divs: Sighting DetailsI was outside my place finishing up a conversation with an old friend that Ihadnt seen in a while, and I was gazing up into the night sky, it was crystalclear, and out of no where I saw an object that looked like a falling star, Iwas facing almost due South, I told my friend that there was an UFO, and heturned to see it too, He refused to believe that it was anything other than asecret military plane, all of the sudden it made a 90 degree turn then it madeanother 90 until it had mad a return to its original path. It was real bright,but the outer edges seemed to turn blue and then back to the original color. Itslowed down considerably, and then disapeared. We talked about it for awhile,then changed the subject. Then I went inside after He drove off.
